iaik.pdf.pdfbox

Class PdfSignatureDetailsPdfBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pdf.pdfbox.PdfSignatureDetailsPdfBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PdfSignatureDetails
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApprovalSignaturePdfBox, DocumentTimestampPdfBox

    public abstract class PdfSignatureDetailsPdfBox
extends java.lang.Object
implements PdfSignatureDetails
    Implementation of the PdfSignatureDetails interface to use PDFBox for extracting and parsing PDF signatures.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of this signature.
      void getRevision(java.io.OutputStream pdfOutStream)
      Write only the signed parts of this document signed by this signature and the signature itself to the given output stream.
      void getRevision(java.io.OutputStream pdfOutStream, int offset)
      Write only the signed parts of this document signed by this signature and the signature itself to the given output stream starting at index offset.
      void getRevision(java.lang.String filename)
      Save only the signed parts of this document signed by this signature and the signature itself to the given path and filename.
      java.util.Calendar getSignatureDictionaryDate()
      Returns the signing date, as set in the PDF signature dictionary (with dictionary key name "M").
      java.lang.String getSubfilter()
      Returns the subfilter of this signature.
      boolean isModified()
      Check whether the document has been modified after the signature was applied by verifying that the document ends after the last byte of the signed version.

      • getSubfilter

        public java.lang.String getSubfilter()
        Description copied from interface: PdfSignatureDetails
        Returns the subfilter of this signature. Typical subfilters are "adbe.pkcs7.detached" for PAdES-basic signatures, "ETSI.CAdES.detached" for PAdES-BES signatures and "ETSI.RFC3161" for PAdES LTV Document Timestamps.
        Specified by:
        getSubfilter in interface PdfSignatureDetails
        Returns:
        the signature's subfilter

      • isModified

        public boolean isModified()
        Description copied from interface: PdfSignatureDetails
        Check whether the document has been modified after the signature was applied by verifying that the document ends after the last byte of the signed version.
        Specified by:
        isModified in interface PdfSignatureDetails
        Returns:
        true, if the document has been modified

      • getRevision

        public void getRevision(java.lang.String filename)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: PdfSignatureDetails
        Save only the signed parts of this document signed by this signature and the signature itself to the given path and filename.
        Specified by:
        getRevision in interface PdfSignatureDetails
        Parameters:
        filename - The path and file name where to save the signed version
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the signed version can't be extracted or written

      • getSignatureDictionaryDate

        public java.util.Calendar getSignatureDictionaryDate()
        Description copied from interface: PdfSignatureDetails
        Returns the signing date, as set in the PDF signature dictionary (with dictionary key name "M"). Does not return the date embedded in the CMS signature.
        Specified by:
        getSignatureDictionaryDate in interface PdfSignatureDetails
        Returns:
        the signing date specified in the PDF signature dictionary
